hints.label: thm-corrected-kl-convergence
hints.title: KL-Convergence for Mean-Field Euclidean Gas (CORRECTED)
hints.content:
593: :label: thm-corrected-kl-convergence
594: 
595: If the kinetic dominance condition holds:
596: 
597: $$
598: \sigma^2 \gamma \kappa_{\text{conf}} > C_0 \max\left(\frac{\lambda}{M_\infty}, \bar{\kappa}\right)
599: $$
600: 
601: then the mean-field Euclidean Gas converges exponentially to its QSD:
602: 
603: $$
604: D_{\text{KL}}(\rho_t \| \rho_\infty) \le e^{-\alpha_{\text{net}} t} D_{\text{KL}}(\rho_0 \| \rho_\infty) + \frac{B_{\text{jump}}}{\alpha_{\text{net}}} (1 - e^{-\alpha_{\text{net}} t})
605: $$
606: 
607: where $\alpha_{\text{net}} = \alpha_{\text{kin}} - A_{\text{jump}} > 0$.
hints.raw_directive:
590: ## 4. Main Theorem (Corrected)
591: 
592: :::{prf:theorem} KL-Convergence for Mean-Field Euclidean Gas (CORRECTED)
593: :label: thm-corrected-kl-convergence
594: 
595: If the kinetic dominance condition holds:
596: 
597: $$
598: \sigma^2 \gamma \kappa_{\text{conf}} > C_0 \max\left(\frac{\lambda}{M_\infty}, \bar{\kappa}\right)
599: $$
600: 
601: then the mean-field Euclidean Gas converges exponentially to its QSD:
602: 
603: $$
604: D_{\text{KL}}(\rho_t \| \rho_\infty) \le e^{-\alpha_{\text{net}} t} D_{\text{KL}}(\rho_0 \| \rho_\infty) + \frac{B_{\text{jump}}}{\alpha_{\text{net}}} (1 - e^{-\alpha_{\text{net}} t})
605: $$
606: 
607: where $\alpha_{\text{net}} = \alpha_{\text{kin}} - A_{\text{jump}} > 0$.
608:
